Package Server

Class ACopyDBController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Server.ACopyDBController
  • public abstract class ACopyDBController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class make the functionality for the server that includes a connection to the DB. The Focus of this class is on functions that deal with 'Copies'

      private static ObjectMessage askForDelay​(ObjectMessage msg, java.sql.Connection connToSQL)
      This function make the change of the 'delay borrowed book' in the DB and sends back to the client the new date
      private static ObjectMessage checkIfAllBorrowed​(ObjectMessage msg, java.sql.Connection connToSQL)
      This function check if all the copies of specific book are borrowed
      static java.lang.String checkIfBookIsAvailableForBorrow​(ObjectMessage msg, java.sql.Connection connToSQL)
      This function check if specifically copy is exist and available for borrow and enter all data of borrow in `obl` DB table
      private static ObjectMessage checkIfUserGotAlreadyCopy​(ObjectMessage msg, java.sql.Connection connToSQL)
      This function check if the readerAccount have already copy of spesifec book
      private static ObjectMessage checkReturnDate​(ObjectMessage msg, java.sql.Connection connToSQL)
      This function check if the book is exist in DB and if desired or not
      private static ObjectMessage closetReturnDate​(ObjectMessage msg, java.sql.Connection connToSQL)  
      private static ObjectMessage deleteBook​(ObjectMessage msg, java.sql.Connection connToSQL)
      This function will delete the requested copy if it possible The function checks if the copy is not borrowed and if there is a reservation to the fitting book and the requested copy is the last in the library-can not delete the copy
      static ObjectMessage getBorrows​(ObjectMessage msg, java.sql.Connection connToSQL)
      This function will return all the borrows of specific reader account also it will provide whether the reader account can ask for delay for each one of his borrows
      private static ObjectMessage getCopyInfo​(ObjectMessage msg, java.sql.Connection connToSQL)
      This function return an object with with the info of the copy that it gets (if its exist)
      static ObjectMessage selection​(ObjectMessage msg, java.sql.Connection connToSQL)
      This function sorts the request in the 'msg' to the relevant function and returns the answer
      private static ObjectMessage tryToReturnBook​(ObjectMessage msg, java.sql.Connection connToSQL)
      This function makes the 'return book' and all the actions that might happen after it

                                      java.sql.Connection connToSQL)
        This function sorts the request in the 'msg' to the relevant function and returns the answer
        Parameters:
        msg - - the object from the client
        connToSQL - - the connection to the MySQL created in the Class OBLServer
        Returns:
        ObjectMessage with the answer to the client

        ObjectMessage with the answer to the client

      • checkReturnDate

        private static ObjectMessage checkReturnDate​(ObjectMessage msg,
                                             java.sql.Connection connToSQL)
        This function check if the book is exist in DB and if desired or not
        Parameters:
        msg - -the object from the client
        connToSQL - - the connection to the MySQL created in the Class OBLServer
        Returns:
        ObjectMessage with the answer to the client if book `Desire book` ,`Not Desire book` or `Not exist book`

      • deleteBook

        private static ObjectMessage deleteBook​(ObjectMessage msg,
                                        java.sql.Connection connToSQL)
        This function will delete the requested copy if it possible The function checks if the copy is not borrowed and if there is a reservation to the fitting book and the requested copy is the last in the library-can not delete the copy
        Parameters:
        msg - - the object from the client
        connToSQL - - the connection to the MySQL created in the Class OBLServer
        Returns:
        ObjectMessage with the answer to the client
